description: The selected candidate could take part in the IT projects related to Data & Analytics (Big Data Solutions) where the candidate will ensure the global ICT services supply aimed at managing the data life cycle related analytics,  and to the usage of "Big Data" and "Cognitive Computing" solutions for the customers and for UBIS Business Lines/Service Lines.  We offer an exciting job in a challenging environment within an international company and are looking for talented people to join the team.
